body_html:
FYI this PR has a typo in it, which breaks XLA builds. The typo is size_typ rather than size_type:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blame/master/tensorflow/compiler/tf2xla/xla_compiler.cc#L228

I think we need a better process for testing such changes. I'm suspecting that "jenkins, test this please" isn't actually compiling / testing XLA? @gunan might have an opinion here.

body:
FYI this PR has a typo in it, which breaks XLA builds.  The typo is `size_typ` rather than `size_type`:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blame/master/tensorflow/compiler/tf2xla/xla_compiler.cc#L228

I think we need a better process for testing such changes.  I'm suspecting that "jenkins, test this please" isn't actually compiling / testing XLA?  @gunan might have an opinion here.
